title: Turkey: Merkel must ensure rights of refugees not cut out of EU-Turkey deal (Amnesty International ...
text: ( Source : Amnesty International Australia ) European leaders' desperate attempts to enlist Turkey as Europe 's gatekeeper are ignoring the manifest failures of the Turkish authorities to respect the rights of refugees and migrants, said
